channel.title: Abouts on Tom's code blog
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on Tom's code blog

item.title: About
item.description: This is the person programming blog of Tom Greenwood (who after this introductory paragraph will henceforth refer to himself in the first person). Most probably, these posts will read as a series of attempts to run before learning to walk. I will enable commenting as soon as I’ve learnt how.. It is built using the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie and then actually modified a little bit more, by me.
